content:
20a7f362ea284b9796:
  'Description': Encompasses all problems and concerns related to the device's
    battery, including overheating, drain, and charging issues.
  'Name': Battery Issues
  'Entity':
    23a864fb3aa3496aa3:
      'Description': The type of battery issue being experienced.
      'Attribute_Name': battery_problem
    e226ee695bf44e3c89:
      'Description': The brand of the mobile device experiencing battery issues.
      'Attribute_Name': mobile_brand
3b413412fdd540d197:
  'Description': This intent refers to the action of removing backup copies
    of data that are no longer needed.
  'Name': Delete Backup
  'Entity':
    47509163d6a6499584:
      'Description': The location of the backup to delete.
      'Attribute_Name': backup_location
    8f77f197eb5b4f85af:
      'Description': The type of backup to delete.
      'Attribute_Name': backup_type
      'Example_values':
      - full
      - incremental
      - differential
    b85cfc29f73840d8a3:
      'Description': The date of the backup to delete.
      'Attribute_Name': backup_date
81762a3f90184f17b4:
  'Description': Refers to the device's battery losing charge faster than
    expected, often due to background apps or screen brightness.
  'Name': Battery Drain
  'Entity':
    41c5601a226a41c0a0:
      'Description': The brand of the mobile device experiencing battery drain
        issue.
      'Attribute_Name': mobile_brand
      'Example_values':
      - Samsung
      - Apple
      - Google
      - OnePlus
      - Xiaomi
    5a25ce836081436b82:
      'Description': The specific model of the mobile device experiencing battery
        drain issue.
      'Attribute_Name': mobile_model
      'Example_values':
      - Galaxy S21
      - iPhone 13
      - Pixel 6
      - OnePlus 9
      - Mi 11
    62c5b0da5e604d2db8:
      'Description': The usage patterns of the mobile device.
      'Attribute_Name': usage_patterns
    7d1540cf8fc2435483:
      'Description': The current battery health of the mobile device.
      'Attribute_Name': battery_health
    f42c92dc8c034a7f82:
      'Description': The background apps running on the mobile device.
      'Attribute_Name': background_apps
    f509f2062d604343b1:
      'Description': The expected battery life of the mobile device.
      'Attribute_Name': battery_life
      'Example_values':
      - less than 6 hours
      - 6-8 hours
      - 8-10 hours
      - more than 10 hours
ecb17ebbabd2406781:
  'Description': This intent relates to the action of creating copies of
    data to prevent data loss or provide access to previous versions of data.
  'Name': Backup Data
  'Entity':
    8c8ab386d03248f99e:
      'Description': The medium where the backup is being stored.
      'Attribute_Name': backup_medium
      'Example_values':
      - external_drive
      - cloud
      - tape
      - disk
    cd6dfc84fbde4c82ba:
      'Description': How often the backup is being performed.
      'Attribute_Name': backup_frequency
    e8e93c9aef3b41d283:
      'Description': The physical or logical location of the backup.
      'Attribute_Name': backup_location
    fac99685b73e43e1b4:
      'Description': The type of backup being performed.
      'Attribute_Name': backup_type
f04d8f08a300433fb2:
  'Description': Addresses concerns about the device's display, such as flickering,
    discoloration, or unresponsiveness.
  'Name': Screen Issues
  'Entity':
    0e7abd7ef2e14c1f9b:
      'Description': The brand of the mobile device.
      'Attribute_Name': mobile_brand
      'Example_values':
      - Samsung
      - Apple
      - Google
      - LG
      - Sony
      - Motorola
      - OnePlus
      - Huawei
    959bcf92ceb94f929d:
      'Description': The type of screen issue being experienced.
      'Attribute_Name': screen_issue
      'Example_values':
      - Cracked screen
      - Unresponsive touchscreen
      - Black screen
      - Display flickering
      - Distorted colors
    a20d6ce366fd432bb9:
      'Description': The specific model of the mobile device.
      'Attribute_Name': mobile_model
      'Example_values':
      - Galaxy S21
      - iPhone 12
      - Pixel 5
      - G8 ThinQ
      - Xperia 1 II
      - Edge+
      - Nord N10
fe900207349c442f8f:
  'Description': Covers problems related to signal strength, data connectivity,
    or call quality.
  'Name': Mobile Network Issues
  'Entity':
    509b4377256242fd8d:
      'Description': The type of network the user is having issues with.
      'Attribute_Name': network_type
    ca1ef473afdc4fffa6:
      'Description': The brand of the mobile phone having network issues.
      'Attribute_Name': mobile_brand
    d05d6a08b4e14cf1ab:
      'Description': The name of the network provider.
      'Attribute_Name': network_provider
    e6417ff5cd0c482681:
      'Description': The specific model of the mobile phone having network
        issues.
      'Attribute_Name': mobile_model

Analyze the statement to identify which of the described scenarios it pertains to, such as battery issues, backup procedures, screen problems, or network connectivity. Format your response in YAML, listing the Id of the matching scenario and detailing the relevant Entities. For each entity, include its Id and the value derived from the statement. If an entity mentioned in the document is not addressed in the statement, assign the value "NA" to that entity. In cases involving the battery drain scenario, include the entity for 'battery_life' (Id: f509f2062d604343b1) only if the statement specifically states the expected battery life in hours. If the statement does not fit any of the scenarios, categorize it under a default category with the identifier "vcg497gsdcv."

"I've been having issues with my Google Pixel 6. The battery drains rapidly, but I'm not sure how long it lasts."

chosen:
Id: 81762a3f90184f17b4
Entities:
  - Id: 41c5601a226a41c0a0
    Value: Google
  - Id: 5a25ce836081436b82
    Value: Pixel 6
  - Id: f509f2062d604343b1
    Value: NA
  - Id: 62c5b0da5e604d2db8
    Value: NA
  - Id: 7d1540cf8fc2435483
    Value: NA
  - Id: f42c92dc8c034a7f82
    Value: NA
rejected:
id: vcg497gsdcv
entities:
    mobile_brand: Google
    battery_drain: NA
    usage_patterns: NA
    battery_health: NA
    background_apps: NA
    battery_life: NA
